Chapter 2: Understanding the Basics

Small how-toâ€™s to keep redundancy in the document at a minimal. Contained in Understanding the Basics are How to Inspect a Page and How to Disable JavaScript.

How to Inspect a Page

  1. Open Google Chrome and navigate to any url, in this case we navigate to this url.

  2. Right click on the page and select the Inspect option.

  3. Congrats! A new window will appear containing the HTML source of the item you chose to inspect.

How to Disable JavaScript

  1. Open Google Chrome and navigate to any url, in this case we navigate to this url.

  2. Click on the disable-HTML icon.

  3. Select Off for JavaScript. This will disable all JavaScript on the webpage.

  4. Congrats! After reloading the page, you will see the webpage as if there were no JavaScript.
